meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_link

languageKey.label: What type of links is this? A link to a URL, a file, a page, a portfolio item or client, or items filtered by client, category or tag.
The link's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
The URL that this link links to.
The page that this link links to.
The file that this link links to.
The file name of the file that this link links to.
The path to the file (in file admin) that this link links to.
The file size in bytes of the file that this link links to - will be converted in the FE to more human readable form.
The file type / extension of the file that this link links to.
The item that this link links to.
The client that this link links to or the client used to filter items by.
The catgeory used to filter items by.
The tag used to filter item's by.
Used to create a nofollow "rel" attribute for this link - external URL's only, to stop search engines indexing / following sponsored links.
The date that this link should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this link should stop showing up in the FE.
